ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes I would recommend this course because it gives a good introduction into how to critically evaluate papers.
A organized discussion section regarding 8 different topics in the field of pharmacology and pathology. I would recommend this class.

In this class, you critique one or two papers a week. You get practice writing and talking about science. You also learn to be more critical of scientific publications. It's a great class I'd recommend to any other student.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helped me to explore ideas and research areas outside of my immediate fields of interest
Very helpful, critically reading papers is always important in this field.
I developed in my ability to critically assess published scientific data. This is really as a new grad student in any department.

As mentioned above, this course is excellent in that it prepares us for critically analyzing everything we read. It also gave us a great opportunity to present, as well as lead a discussion. All of this will be helpful in our future careers.
